Author: Tiny_Buttercups98
Text: Going to an all girls school taught me one thing, you just gotta distance yourself from those people.  Walk away from them when they come near you  tell them straight up to go away. Dont worry about being rude. They're toxic. Seriously they're only doing this to make themselves feel good. You pay for that fitness class you can choose who you spend that time with

Author: lavenzy
Text: With or without the ed, those girls behaviours seem to suck. Try distracting yourself talking to other people or sth if you want and dont let them affect you so much :*
